document_data.name: The Old Owl
document_data.mainbody:
{{otheruses4|the tavern|other uses|Old Owl (disambiguation)}}
'''The Old Owl''' was a tavern in the town of [[Loudwater]] in the [[Savage Frontier]], in operation in the 1360s [[DR]]. The proprietor was a retired warrior.
document_data.Description: It was a quiet, family-oriented established also preferred by elders. Common activities were muted conversation, playing cards, and smoking. Indeed, revelers who were loud or boisterous were asked to go someplace else. Prices were low and while the liquor range was limited, the homebrew was especially good.
document_data.History: The inn was established by [[1366 DR]] and still in operation through [[1370 DR]].
